attributes.action: kings norton green (Birmingham) roundabout is dangerous, improve this junction
attributes.additional_details: The roundabout at Kings Norton Green, Birmingham is such a dangerous junction. I am hoping that someone will assess it and improve this junction. Currently it is dangerous for both drivers and pedestrians. Many drivers do not signal at all on this roundabout and the lanes are mixed up. There is no safe way for pedestrians to cross this part of Redditch road.
